summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NBCFDC Credit Scoring and Digital Lending Platform. All backend APIs and frontend functionality working correctly including authentication, credit scoring with AI, mock data generation, and loan applications.
passed_tests: Dashboard loading with stats display (beneficiaries, applications, approval rate)
Mock beneficiary data generation (10 beneficiaries with realistic data)
Beneficiary list display with cards showing all required information
Search and filter functionality on dashboard
Beneficiary information display (name, age, business type, loan details)
Consumption data updates (electricity, mobile, utility bills)
AI-powered credit score calculation using Emergent LLM
Loan application through digital lending module
Loan applications page with status badges
Error handling for invalid requests (404 responses)
All API endpoints returning correct status codes
